mapper.select: select * from t_cart where user_id=#{userId} and product_id=#{productId};
mapper.insert: insert into t_cart (user_id, product_id, product_image, product_name, product_price, num) VALUES (#{userId},#{productId},#{productImage},#{productName},#{productPrice},#{num});
mapper.update: update t_cart set num=#{num} where user_id=#{userId} and product_id=#{productId};
mapper.delete: delete from t_cart where user_id=#{userId} and product_id=#{productId};
